summary: Makes the Argonian race stronger while remaining mostly lore friendly.
descriptionHtml:
Only requires base Skyrim - No DLC required

Install:
Copy Superior Argonians.esp to your Skyrim data folder

Uninstall
Delete Superior Argonians.esp from your Skyrim data folder

Makes the Argonian race stronger while remaining mostly 
lore friendly.

CHANGE LIST
Argonians are immune to poison (Resist Poison 100%).
Argonians deal increased unarmed damage (+8 Unarmed damage).

CHANGES INCLUDED IN UPDATE 1
Restoration Swaped for Illusion (My RaceSkillMod is incompatible with this mod).
Natural health regeneration increased to 4.000 (up from 0.700).
Hist Skin power removed (Attempt one to balance increased natural regeneration).
Change race text on race menu (Reference to poison immunity & increased regeneration).

CHANGES INCLUDED IN UPDATE 2
Argonians are immune to poison (Resist Poison 100%).
Argonians deal increased unarmed damage (+8 Unarmed damage).
Restoration Swaped for Illusion (My RaceSkillMod is incompatible with this mod).
Natural health regeneration restored to default
Child of the Hist lesser power added (Regen health 10x faster but no stamina or magica regen)
Change race text on race menu (Reference to poison immunity & increased regeneration).
author: HuntsInShadow
